snippet: Mashawn Sonds, 26, attacked the woman, Kimball Hartman, 29, as she walked down Bushwick Avenue in Brooklyn.
abstract: Mashawn Sonds of Brooklyn is convicted of first-degree assault as hate crime in connection with attack on transgender woman Kimball Hartman in Bushwick section of borough in 2014.
lead_paragraph: Mashawn Sonds, 26, attacked the woman, Kimball Hartman, 29, as she walked down Bushwick Avenue in Brooklyn.

headline.main: Attacker Convicted in Hate Crime on Transgender Woman in Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: Attacker Convicted in Hate Crime in Brooklyn
